entries.title_d: Our squad has been assigned to assist in a guerilla strike on an Imperial space station. We need to pave the way through enemy defense for the Alliance B-Wing bombers.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Help the Alliance attack on an Imperial space station.
entries.split_quest_alert_fail: Worvog Arkon: < We managed to do some damage but our Bombers are in trouble. Stand by for orders. >
entries.split_quest_alert: Worvog Arkon: < Damnation! One of the Rebels B-Wing squadrons have been intercepted by Imperial ships and need help, stand by. >
entries.quest_location_d: The Dathomir system is normally dangerous but this sector of it will be even worse. You will be close to an Imperial base and enemies will be everywhere.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: Join up with the other ships from Worvog's squadron and destroy the Imperial presence in the area.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: This is the point of attack. We will breach the Imperial defences here so that the B-Wing bombers can press through and launch their payload on the station.
entries.found_loc: We will meet you at this location, hurry over here or we will start without you.
entries.enemies_win: Pull out of there pilot! We're doomed, I can...
entries.enemies_remain: Nym Squadron Leader: < Yehaa! Take that you Imperial scum! Only %DI more guys! >
entries.enemies_arrived: My sensors show multiple bogeys. Looks like this will be a lot of fun guys.
entries.battle_started: Time to show these fools the wrath of the pirates of Nym, take no prisoners guys!
entries.allies_win: Great job everyone, the Rebel bomber squadrons are closing in. You are free to pull out.
entries.allies_remain: Nym Squadron Leader: < Hang in there guys! We can do this! >
entries.allies_arrived: We are in position to start the attack. Join up pilot.
